title: Increasing speed limits is a terrible idea – we can't afford to drive any faster
text:
News that the motorway speed limit could soon be increased to 80mph was enthusiastically welcomed by the British moron community, which for years has been campaigning for the right to drive faster, wherever they want, all of the time.

“I’ve been thinking about the issue, and maybe even sought advice on the subject of late,” revealed Transport Secretary Grant Shapps at a conference in Manchester the other day.

“When it was last looked at in 2011, reviewing the last submission to ministers on the subject, it was thought the carbon emission addition would be too great. But since I am a driver of an electric car myself, I got to thinking about whether that would still be the case.
